scripts.test-b2: npm rm browserify && npm install browserify@2 && npm run test-main
scripts.test-b3: npm rm browserify && npm install browserify@3 && npm run test-main
scripts.test-b4: npm rm browserify && npm install browserify@4 && npm run test-main
scripts.test-b5: npm rm browserify && npm install browserify@5 && npm run test-main
scripts.test-b6: npm rm browserify && npm install browserify@6 && npm run test-main
scripts.test-b7: npm rm browserify && npm install browserify@7 && npm run test-main
scripts.test: npm run test-b2 && npm run test-b3 && npm run test-b4 && npm run test-b5 && npm run test-b6 && npm run test-b7
scripts.shim-jquery: npm install opener && cd ./examples/shim-jquery && npm install && node build.js && opener index.html
scripts.shim-jquery-diag: npm install opener && cd ./examples/shim-jquery && npm install && node build-diag.js && opener index.html
scripts.expose-jquery: npm install opener && cd ./examples/expose-jquery && npm install && node build.js && opener index.html
scripts.expose-jquery-diag: npm install opener && cd ./examples/expose-jquery && npm install && node build-diag.js && opener index.html
